find_non_black_grey_pixels.prompt: find all not black and not grey pixels

find_covering_area.prompt: find the 3x3 area in the input_grid which could cover all pixels in p

find_grey_pixel.prompt: find the grey pixel in the input_grid

get_centered_3x3_area_index.code:
def get_centered_3x3_area_index(x: int, y: int) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:
    return [(i, j) for i in range(x - 1, x + 2) for j in range(y - 1, y + 2)]
get_centered_3x3_area_index.prompt: get index of the 3x3 area whose center pixel is (x,y)

copy_area_to_new_location.prompt: copy area a to area n in the input_grid

find_grey_centered_3x3_area.code:
def find_grey_centered_3x3_area(a: Tuple[int, int, int, int], input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    x, y = "find the grey pixel in the input_grid"(input_grid)
    n = "get index of the 3x3 area whose center pixel is (x,y)"(x, y)
    out = "copy area a to area n in the input_grid"(input_grid, a, n)
    return out

main.code:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    p = "find all not black and not grey pixels"(input_grid)
    a = "find the 3x3 area in the input_grid which could cover all pixels in p"(input_grid, p)
    out = find_grey_centered_3x3_area(a, input_grid)
    return out
